name: Coloring Story - Happy Home
description:
Have you ever dreamed about being a professional decorator? Are you passionate about drawing and painting different stuff? Then Coloring Story - Happy Home would become one of your most favourite games you ever played!

Paint by numbers, get coins, buy furniture and decorate your space. Download and try it now!

Features:
- Meet cute Sparky the dog and the furniture master Michael - your best design team ever!
- Express yourself with a variety of locations and things - start with a cozy Cafe and decorate it the way you want!
- Challenge your sense of design - change wall colors, flooring and furniture placements. Be free in your choice!
- Interact with lucky clients - start with Henry, an architect and unfold his funny traits;
- A plethora of coloring works - relax and paint. Use prompts to paint faster.

Become a professional decorator. Paint by number, buy furniture and decorate spaces. Start drawing, relax and train your concentration skills. Art and decoration in one place. Paint your way into decors! Play now!
